,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1; ,,, Over-voltage, Over-current, Reverse-voltage Protection IC;OnSemi;NPC372;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Armbian |availability = discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 12/2014 |estprice = 35 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Korea |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== eMMC module connector with modules of 8, 16, 32 and 64 GB available. {{See also|:Category:Hardkernel#Models|List of SBCs}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Amlogic]]'' S805 @1.5GHz Quad Core (ARM Cortex-A5) *GPU: Mali-400 MP2 @600MHz *Storage: SDHC Card slot, eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 1GB DDR3 SDRAM ==Links of Interest== *{{WPLink|ODROID}} *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-c1/odroid-c1 ''ODROID-C1'' on '''ODROID Wiki'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2014/12/10/hardkernel-odroid-c1-is-a-35-development-board-powered-by-amlogic-s805-quad-core-processor/ ''Hardkernel ODROID-C1 is a $35 Development Board Powered
by Amlogic S805 Quad Core Processor'' on '''CNX|Soft'''] ==Pictures==
